alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:58AM EDT until April 19 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Lafayette, Montezuma, and Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. .Rainfall amounts of one to two inches across much of central Indiana yesterday will lead to lowland and minor flooding along the East Fork White, lower White, and Wabash Rivers. River flooding could last into next week in lower parts of the basins. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Old Darwin Road and a few low rural roads between York and Hutsonville, Illinois begin to flood. Agricultural flooding begins along portions of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 16.6 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
